long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SpeakQL helps analytics and growth teams write SQL 3x faster. Simply speak your query and SpeakQL will instantly transcribe your words into valid SQL code.

Churn out SQL much faster and spend less time debugging. SpeakQL fits right into your existing workflows. Activate recording with a keyboard shortcut, and the transcribed SQL code is automatically copied to clipboard.
